snippet: On the second day of testimony in the case, survivors, emergency workers and the father of a victim painted a vivid portrait of a street littered with bodies.
abstract: Witnesses testifying at Boston Marathon bombing trial paint harrowing picture of tragic day, describing bloody street littered with bodies; survivors of bombing have coped in different ways, with some seeing it as essential to come face to face with Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in court.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and JESS BIDGOOD

lead_paragraph: On the second day of testimony in the case, survivors, emergency workers and the father of a victim painted a vivid portrait of a street littered with bodies.

headline.main: Accounts of Heartbreak in Tsarnaev Trial as Victims of Boston Marathon Bombings Testify
headline.print_headline: Accounts of Blood and Heartbreak in Boston Trial
